award_title: EAGER: Novel high bandgap inorganic solar cell for tandem junction cells with CdTe
subject: Getting credit when simulation code gets reused
body:
Simulation outputs from parameter sweeps are nearly impossible to shareâ€”too big for supplements, code won't run outside your cluster.

We built Ouro to package computational workflows so others can actually build on them, not just cite them.

Quick chat? Happy to wait until after the holidays if that's easier.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
